name: John SnowBall
description:
John SnowBall is here, and he's ready to fly!

Help John the SnowBall man switch between snowflake orbits to get a massive high score! Jump between obstacles to dash your way to the top of the high score leaderboard in this wonderful, colorful adventure.

Are you ready to fly to the edge of the galaxy? Install now to enjoy this amazing arcade game brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
